item.title: Unix permissions
item.description: Unix permissions with chmod Useful examples: Make it executable: chmod +x ./run.sh Root only file access: chmod 000 ./.creds Read-only exclusively for file owner: chmod 400 ./special-toy ...

item.title: cURL cheatsheet
item.description: cURL cheatsheet Use a custom loopback interface (e.g. 127.1.2.3): curl --interface 127.1.2.3 -v http://127.57.57.57:8057/ .
